title: Assessing the Ability of a Large Language Model to Score Free-Text Medical Student Clinical Notes: Quantitative Study
details: HB Burke, A Hoang, JO Lopreiato, H King, P Hemmer… - JMIR Medical Education, 2024
abstract: Background Teaching medical students the skills required to acquire, interpret, apply, and communicate clinical information is an integral part of medical education. A crucial aspect of this process involves providing students with feedback regarding …

title: Subgraph-level federated graph neural network for privacy-preserving recommendation with meta-learning
details: Z Han, C Hu, T Li, Q Qi, P Tang, S Guo - Neural Networks, 2024
abstract: Graph neural networks (GNN) are widely used in recommendation systems, but traditional centralized methods raise privacy concerns. To address this, we introduce a federated framework for privacy-preserving GNN-based recommendations. This …
